title: LF Jungler to trial for Mafia.eSports (Plat+)
body: Hey there! I am BiBiAhn, the manager for the Mafia.eSports! I am currently looking for Junglers (Plat+) to trial for Mafia. If interested please add me on LoL Client (BiBiAhn) or my Discord BiBiAhn#1750. Looking forward to hear from you all!
